summary: The diff adds a Valentine-themed React page with evasive No-button logic and a Yes success state, plus significant unrequested backend/auth/react-query scaffolding. The required static meme image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated is not present in the diff, and the App.tsx truncation prevents confirming some exact content (question text, button labels, and exact meme image usage).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated image(s) as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not fetch images from the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: No file under frontend/public/assets/generated (e.g., valentine-good-choice-meme.dim_1024x1024.png) is shown as added in the diff, so the required static asset inclusion cannot be verified.
evidence: File diff summary shows no additions under frontend/public/assets/generated

missing_requirements.requirement: When the user clicks "Yes", replace the prompt/buttons with a celebratory view that displays a meme image containing the text: "Good choice".
missing_requirements.reason: The success-state portion of App.tsx is truncated before any reference can be verified, and no static asset file is shown added; therefore the required meme image and its exact text cannot be confirmed from the diff summary.
evidence: File diff summary shows no additions under frontend/public/assets/generated

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a single-page romantic Valentine prompt UI that asks: "Will you be my Valentine?" and shows exactly two options: "Yes" and "No".
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx is truncated; the diff summary indicates a Valentine interactive component, but the exact on-load question text and the exact two button labels cannot be verified from the provided snippet.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded backend canister code even though no backend changes are required for this single-page interaction.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says no backend changes are required; diff adds backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Internet Identity authentication/provider flow (AuthClient, identity context) despite being a stated non-goal (no user accounts/auth).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest Non-goals include user accounts/authentication (including Internet Identity); diff adds an InternetIdentityProvider and related hook implementation and wraps the app with it.

hallucinated_features.description: Added react-query actor hook and backend actor creation logic, implying backend interaction scaffolding that is unnecessary for the requested static single-page interaction.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest says backend should remain unused unless strictly necessary; diff adds useActor hook that creates backend actors and invalidates/refetches queries.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a lucide-react Heart icon dependency/usage for UI decoration.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints say not to introduce other frameworks; while an icon library is not a framework, it is an unrequested new dependency/feature not mentioned in requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added extra Tailwind plugins/config (typography, container-queries, tailwindcss-animate) beyond the Valentine page requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; diff includes these plugins in Tailwind config.
